Title: Anne no Nikki
Description: ['Amsterdam, June 12, 1942. Anne celebrates her 13th birthday and begins her diary, which she calls "Kitty". Hiding for two years from the German threat, the young girl writes about her idealistic views on the world, her ambitions, her fears and her first love, Peter.']
Related: ['Alternative version: Anne no Nikki: Anne Frank Monogatari']
